tool_description: The Powerball Lottery Data API is a comprehensive and up-to-date resource for accessing historical data related to the Powerball lottery in the United States. This API offers a wealth of information, spanning from the year 2010 to the present, allowing users to retrieve data on Powerball drawings, winning numbers, and more.
name: Powerball
title: Powerball

api_list.name: Powerball Detail By Code
api_list.description: Get details on a single powerball by using the "code" url parameter
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball9.p.rapidapi.com/lottery/powerball/OMV0aLkbzbAU7YW0oYwz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://powerball9.p.rapidapi.com/lottery/powerball/{code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "powerball9.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Powerball List
api_list.description:
